ModMetaData.name: CE Invisible Vests and Backpacks
ModMetaData.author: OverlordZeni
ModMetaData.description: Being tacticool is neat and all, but so are pretty dresses! Adds an invisible copy of each load bearing apparel. Can be crafted or mercilessly torn off of the dead or dying at your convenience. Supports CE 1.5 and 1.6.
